H0.text: What is the surname of Mary, still alive aged 99, the longest lived Prime Minister’s spouse. Thatcher

H1.text: What is the surname of Mary, still alive aged 99, the longest lived Prime Minister’s spouse. Blair

H2.text: What is the surname of Mary, still alive aged 99, the longest lived Prime Minister’s spouse. Churchill

H3.text: What is the surname of Mary, still alive aged 99, the longest lived Prime Minister’s spouse. WILSON

A4.text: Mary Wilson died on 6 June 2018 at the age of 102.

A5.text: Mary Wilson outlived her husband by 23 years.
